name: (C) Ref. Case RTU, Other Fossil Heat
_description: Ref. case oil furnace integrated in packaged rooftop unit

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of typical commercial RTU lifetime

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies: Appendix A
source_data.author: U.S. Energy Information Admnistration

notes: Heating multiple of 79% was determined by dividing square feet in which main heating equipment is oil or propane packaged unit (961852 sf) by square feet in which main heating equipment is oil or propane furnace or packaged unit (4543002 sf)

cooling multiple of 6% was determined by dividing square feet in which cooling equipment is packaged AND heating equipment is fossil other than natural gas (23161652 sf) by square feet with same cooling constraint and heating across all fuel types (357885079 sf).
